column4: I did wonder why apple didn't use the AMD chips at first. But I suppose that Intel had the name that the general public recognise, and have full integrated chipset options
OK, now I feel uberstupid. I can't work out how to download the diskimage of the ubuntu i'm supposed to install
yeah, I think Intel was the logical choice. And you know, as a 19 year old who's never formally studied anything about the industry i'm qualified to make statements like that and all... =/
never mind. this is teh internets. you are qualified enough if you look around at your audience =D
